name: Sleeping Kittens
description:
This is a cute little game about a cat mother who has to put her 4 kittens to sleep. But the naughty little kittens dont want to go to sleep yet, so you have to help Ms. Kitty to go find their favorite toys as this is the only thing that calms the kittens down. 

In the game the gamepad controls are shown but the game is playable with keyboard too.

Y = B on the keyboard

X = Spacebar

The Game was created for the  #LOWREZJAM 2022

Graphics are selfmade

Sounds are all from freesound.org
